articles.author: Jihye Lee, Lim Hui Jie
articles.title: Asia markets largely rise ahead of key Chinese data releases for April - CNBC
articles.description: Market watchers were largely expecting a rebound in growth, but the economic data for April widely missed expectations as the economy continued to show an uneven recovery path.
articles.content:
Gas will be at the front and center of discussions at the Group of Seven summit meeting later this week, S&P Global's Vice Chairman Daniel Yergin told CNBC's "Squawk Box Asia."
Yergin's comments… [+717 chars]
